item.title: ISSvideo

item.description: App to watch live video feeds from the international space station   Features:   View the geographic location of the ISS See live video See the HD video (old recordings, finished live experiment) Watching NASA TV Live   Here are some screenshots of the application:     Download the latest version ( v. 0.5.2 | […]

item.title: Televisioni
item.dc:creator: MD
item.description: App to watch streaming of some Italian televisions; most channels are from the official web pages, so from abroad they won’t work (unless you use a VPN with Italian server)! If you should see badly in the internal viewer, especially on tablets, use the share icon to open them with the desired browser.   A […]

item.title: Radiolina
item.dc:creator: MD
item.description: This is an app for streaming some Italian radio stations   There are currently the following radios (Parentheses include abbreviations of the provinces where the radio bases reside):   RTL 102.5 RMC (Radio Monte Carlo, Italian version) Rai Radio 1 Rai Radio 2 Rai Radio 3 Virgin Radio Radio 105 – Hits Radio 24 (da […]

item.title: Bugs Go Android Mod ITA
item.dc:creator: MD
item.description: Hello, I have partially translated into Italian the application Bugs go for drones mjx This version can be installed and tested together with the other (the version you have already installed will not be overwritten, you can keep both) In addition to partial Italian, you can set a higher flight height (be careful only in […]
